project.description: check that the backups actually ran

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e ; set -u
check() { JSON=`curl http://tom-server:8080/job/$1/lastBuild/api/json` TIMESTAMP=${JSON##*timestamp\":}; TIMESTAMP=${TIMESTAMP%%,*}; TIMESTAMP=$(($TIMESTAMP / 1000)) NOW=`date +%s`
echo $(($NOW - $TIMESTAMP)) if [ $(($NOW - $TIMESTAMP)) -gt 86400 ]; then echo "check on $1 failed" exit 1 fi }
check "jenkins-backup" check "primary-backup"
